snippet: An enraged mob in the township of Khutsong killed five people who were thought to be criminals.
abstract: South African police say five people thought to be criminals were killed by an enraged mob, latest act of vigilantism in a country plagued by high rates of violent crime.
lead_paragraph: An enraged mob in the township of Khutsong killed five people who were thought to be criminals.

headline.main: Vigilante Groups Kill 5 in South Africa
headline.print_headline: Vigilante Groups Kill 5 in South Africa
